title: feat: add OVH Whisper speech-to-text transcription
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Introduces Whisper Large V3 speech-to-text transcription capabilities via a new API endpoint.
gist.impact: Developers can now transcribe audio files with high accuracy and transparent per-second pricing.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee wearing retro headphones, watching golden sound waves transform into scrolling pixel text. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. The bee character with chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text showing 'speech to text'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
